article.headline: UC Irvine 77, UC Davis 66
article.story: IRVINE, Calif. (AP) -- Jeff Gloger scored 20 points to tie his career best and lead UC Irvine to a 77-66 victory over UC Davis Saturday night. Gloger made six of nine shots and grabbed eight rebounds, one shy of his season high. Aaron Fitzgerald added 14 points while Nic Campbell and Greg Ethington scored 10 points apiece for the Anteaters (12-11). Rommel Marentez scored 16 points for the Aggies (10-15), who have lost six of their last eight games. Madison Butts came off the bench to add a season-high 12 points and Ryan Moore had 11. UC Davis took a 27-26 lead on Thomas Juillerat's jumper with 4:01 left in the first half. But the Aggies failed to score another basket in the half as Irvine built a 34-30 halftime lead. The Anteaters began the second half with an 11-2 run that gave them a 45-32 advantage with 14:46 to play. Fitzgerald scored five points and Gloger had four during the run.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
